tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife had prolonged periods for almost 15 days last month & while searching for a gynaecologist in OMR , we found Dr.Karthiga devi through Practo & took my wife to apollo hospitals after fixing appointment.

She patiently listened to all the symptoms and after looking at the USG scan and other blood reports , she explained in detail about the various options for treating the 6cms & 2cms fibroids & she also did a pap smear test in no time to rule out if there are any other complications.She put in front of us all the possible options and never pushed us for any unwanted tests or even for the laparoscopy surgery she asked us to wait for 3 months but due to personal reasons we decided to get the surgery done immediately.

She is such a positive person and the moment we entered the room , she made my wife very comfortable and she was so patience in hearing to what the patient had to say and answer all our query patiently neither skipping nor rushing.She is very attentive , kind , caring , helpful and her words will give you a lot of confidence which is what is most needed from any doctor. 

Like very few doctors , she had shared her mobile number to get in touch for any doubts or any emergency through whatsapp and i must say not even once my message went unanswered and helped us whenever needed.

Being a doctor specifically a gynaecologist is really not easy is what i understood in the last 1 month as they need to be available 24/7 and the respect towards the doctors community has immensely increased because of her & i wish her & keep her in my prayers to continue to do the great job.

Apollo hospitals perungudi - Decent Hospital with great rooms & completely equipped with all latest facility.Doctors available 24/7 incase of any emergency.You have almost all the speciality doctor visiting the apollo perungudi clinic and i strongly recommend to visit them on a week day as weekends are completely full.

I Strongly Recommend Dr.Karthiga Devi to any one who is looking for a good gynaecologist / Obstetrician in Chennai & be rest assured you are in safest hands.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: Doctor Karthiga Devi has been so gentle, polite and patient in hearing the issue and has just been so friendly and started treatment with care immediately. She was very optimistic and made me feel comfortable with. A very kind Dr. one will  just feel like having her as a family obstetrician cum gynaecologist after having a consultation with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to Dr. Karthiga Devi with severe Endometriosis/ ovarian cysts. During my first visit, she patiently listened to me and allowed me to share my medical history. As a first timer, I felt a sincere connection with her. She asked me to take a USG. On seeing the results, she explained my physical condition clearly and she made me understand that the cyst had to be surgically removed for my overall health and well being. 

In a week, I had undergone a laparoscopic surgery. Dr.Karthiga Devi ensured that I had a smooth pre-op,surgery and follow up. She ensured that I had good physical and mental health post surgery.She gave her utmost care.Her attitude and approach towards me was very soothing. Post surgery, I keep a good health. She alleviated all the pain that I had earlier. In nutshell, she is my guardian angelâ˜º. 

She is very personable and her demeanour put any patient at ease. Importantly, in times of need, we can easily approach her. *** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** ***** I highly recommend her to any woman who needs medical help. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We met Dr. Karthiga Devi around 6 months into my pregnancy, and she was super kind, non-judgmental, friendly, and easily approachable. She and her team efficiently solved a complication I had during labor. Even the post-delivery care was fantastic; she kept following up on my well-being. I would wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone looking for a memorable pregnancy journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
For the very first time I met her this evening . Dr Karthiga Devi is a very friendly type and the way she explains about the issue was so simple and clarity. 
She is taking care of her patients like her family members , such a kind and sweet doctor ðŸ’“

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Maternal Care/ Checkup,Labor and Delivery,
review: I am one among those who faced a lot of issues and challenges in pregnancy! I had miscarriages and also a still birth. Dr. Karthiga had helped me a lot during my toughest situations and provided a great assistance and full support when I became pregnant again! As mine was marked as a high risk pregnancy, she took extra care of me, never failed to answer my calls during emergency situations, offered 24/7 support, and above all, she helped me deliver a healthy baby through normal delivery! Such a sweet and caring person one could ever see in the medical field! I feel thankful to her everyday I see my child! Thank you for everything you have done maâ€™am! Please keep up your good work!!
reply_text: Thankyou sooo much.  It means a lot me..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: When we were looking for a polite and caring gynaecologist at chennai, We were  referred Dr. Karthiga devi madam at Apollo hospitals by my sister-in-law.   From our initial visit till our post delivery visits she took good care of my wife and guided us throughout her pregnancy. She was so friendly and caring. She would clarify all our doubts(even silly ones) and spend ample time with us. We had our pregenancy post covid -19, in these troublesome times she gave us advice for a safe pregnancy.  She guided us very well at every trimester by explaining in detail all the  dos and  don'ts , diet and exercise. My wife's normal delivery  was possible because of her guidance. She is one of the most dedicated doctor answering all your queries and visiting patients at the hospital whenever needed. I would suggest her for anyone looking for a good caring gynaecologist at chennai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Gynae Problems,
review:
*********** **** ** *** ** *** **** ************* **** **** ******* a very good and friendly doctor, after moving out of my native(Bangalore) I've visited 4 gynaecologist with none I was satisfied. 

I visited her when I was 2 month's pregnant with my second baby.  She guided and cared me till end of my delivery and now continuing the same with my postpartum days

Dr.karthiga devi is always available for emergency calls and enquiries from her patients and also she herself will follow up on most of the cases.

Now I find myself totally comfortable with dr.karthiga devi. As long as I stay in Chennai she would be my gynaecologist. 

Best and friendly doctor I've come across.
I strongly suggest Dr.Karthigs Devi for all your gynae problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr. Karthigadevi for my pregnancy and it was such an amazing experience. I delivered last week by normal delivery and throughout labor she was there by my side motivating me and its something many doctors wouldn't do. Every checkup with her is like a counselling for me. Her checkup doesn't stop with checkup she gives lot of emotional and natural advice too. She spends comfortable with patients and helps us come out of that delivery fear. I am so happy I found madame  and I feel lucky to have found her. Dr. Karthigadevi is a great human being.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Hi , I have been consulting with karthiga Devi mam for the past nine months . She made my pregnancy journey easy. I had many health issues and was sceptical about delivering a healthy baby , but doctor helped me to overcome all my fears and now delivered a healthy baby
